meanings.definition: A Greek sauce made from yogurt, cucumber, garlic, and herbs.
meanings.sent1: I love to dip my vegetables in tzatziki.
meanings.sent2: The gyro sandwich was delicious with tzatziki sauce.
meanings.sent3: The tzatziki sauce decided to have a dance party with the pita bread.
meanings.sent4: The cool tzatziki sauce was a refreshing waterfall on the warm gyro.
meanings.sent5: The creamy tzatziki sauce was as white as snow and as flavorful as a garden of herbs.
